note.p: Burial: A vault in Chelsea churchyard
Education: St Edmund Hall, Oxford; BA (1638), MA (1641); Trinity College, Cambridge; LLD (Lit. Reg. 1670); Incorporated at Oxford (1672)

Career: Reader in Rhetoric, Oxford (1641); travelled extensively in Europe (1642-1660); Secretary to Charles Howard, Earl of Carlisle (1669); Tutor to Henry Fitzroy, Duke of Grafton (1679); English tutor to Prince George of Denmark
Sources: Bulloch's Roll; DNB; Venn; Foster; Hunter
